model.gameplay

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.gameplay.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is dealing with each player's data changes like owned countries, armies, and cards
    Author:
    Yann Kerichard, Yueshuai Jiang, Che-Shao Chen

        public boolean owns(int countryNumber)
        The method is for checking correctness that a player with how many countries he or she owned
        Parameters:
        countryNumber - The total owned country number of a player
        Returns:
        return Return true means correct, and false means incorrect with the owned country number of a player

      • reinforcementMove

        public void reinforcementMove(Country country,
                              int armies)
        To execute a reinforcement move. It moves the armies and update the action.
        Parameters:
        country - The country to reinforce.
        armies - The number of armies to add.

      • conquestMove

        public boolean conquestMove(Country attacker,
                            Country defender,
                            int armies)
        To execute a conquest move after an attack. It moves the armies and update the action.
        Parameters:
        attacker - The attacker country.
        defender - The defender country.
        armies - The number of armies to move.
        Returns:
        boolean saying if the attacker conquered the defender territory.

      • fortificationMove

        public void fortificationMove(Country origin,
                              Country destination,
                              int armies)
        To execute a fortification move. It moves the armies and update the action.
        Parameters:
        origin - Origin country.
        destination - Destination country.
        armies - The number of armies to move.

      • allOutAttack

        public boolean allOutAttack(Country attackerCtry,
                            Country defenderCtry)
        This method will process the all-out attack mode.
        Parameters:
        attackerCtry - Country attacking
        defenderCtry - Country defending
        Returns:
        boolean Tell if the defender country has been conquered

      • classicAttack

        public boolean classicAttack(Country attackerCtry,
                             Country defenderCtry,
                             Dices dices)
        This method will process the classic attack mode. The players provide their dices.
        Parameters:
        attackerCtry - Country attacking
        defenderCtry - Country defending
        dices - Dices selected by the players
        Returns:
        boolean Tell if the defender country has been conquered

      • battle

        private void battle(Map map,
                    Dices dices,
                    Country attackerCtry,
                    Country defenderCtry)
        This class will compute a battle. It rolls the dice, computing the result, and resolve the loss of both sides.
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        dices - the dices
        attackerCtry - attacker country
        defenderCtry - defender country

      • canContinueAttacking

        public boolean canContinueAttacking()
        Check if a player can continue to attack during the attack phase. At least one of its own countries must be able to launch an attack.
        Returns:
        boolean if we can continue attacking
